title: Episode 76 "Season Finale" w/ Luis Guzman
itunes:title: Episode 76 "Season Finale" w/ Luis Guzman
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with actor / activist Luis Guzman. EFN skypes in while filming his new documentary film in Colombia. The guys talk acting, politics, Narco's, Carlitos Way, and a lot more. This episode also marks the season finale as Drink Champs starts a new release schedule. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
